description: Send a message to a Cisco Spark Room or Individual.

personal_token.description: Your personal access token required to validate the Spark API.

message.description: The message you would like to send.

recipient_id.description: The unique identifier associated with the supplied C(recipient_type).

message_type.description: Specifies how you would like the message formatted.

recipient_type.description: The request parameter you would like to send the message to. Messages can be sent to either a room or individual (by ID or E-Mail).
